1.0.name: wordpress/wp-picasa-image
1.0.description:
You just need to copy the address of the pictures from Picasa album, then this plugin will help you modify the address to show in you posts. If the address of picture is not from Picasa, it won't do anything. The plugin has been embeded into backstage editor, so you don't need to modify the theme files.

If you found any problem, please let me know.
